speaker: ELBOW
text: Nay, if there be no remedy for it

speaker: ELBOW
text: but that you will needs buy and sell men and

speaker: ELBOW
text: women like beasts, we shall have all the world drink

speaker: ELBOW
text: brown and white bastard.

speaker: DUKE
text: O heavens, what stuff is here?

speaker: POMPEY
text: ’Twas never merry world since, of two usuries,

speaker: POMPEY
text: the merriest was put down, and the worser allowed

speaker: POMPEY
text: by order of law a furred gown to keep him warm,

speaker: POMPEY
text: and furred with fox and lambskins too, to signify

speaker: POMPEY
text: that craft, being richer than innocency, stands for

speaker: POMPEY
text: the facing.

speaker: ELBOW
text: Come your way, sir.—Bless you, good father

speaker: ELBOW
text: friar.

speaker: DUKE
text: And you, good brother father. What

speaker: DUKE
text: offense hath this man made you, sir?

speaker: ELBOW

speaker: ELBOW
text: we take him to be a thief too, sir, for we have found

speaker: ELBOW
text: upon him, sir, a strange picklock, which we have

speaker: ELBOW
text: sent to the Deputy.

speaker: ELBOW
text: His neck will come to your waist—a cord, sir.

speaker: POMPEY
text: I spy comfort, I cry bail. Here’s a gentleman

speaker: POMPEY
text: and a friend of mine.

speaker: LUCIO
text: How now, noble Pompey? What, at the wheels of

speaker: LUCIO
text: Caesar? Art thou led in triumph? What, is there

speaker: LUCIO
text: none of Pygmalion’s images, newly made woman,

speaker: LUCIO
text: to be had now, for putting the hand in the pocket

speaker: LUCIO
text: and extracting it clutched? What reply, ha? What

speaker: LUCIO
text: sayst thou to this tune, matter, and method? Is ’t not

speaker: LUCIO
text: drowned i’ th’ last rain, ha? What sayst thou, trot? Is

speaker: LUCIO
text: the world as it was, man? Which is the way? Is it sad

speaker: LUCIO
text: and few words? Or how? The trick of it?

speaker: DUKE
text: Still thus, and thus; still worse.

speaker: LUCIO
text: How doth my dear morsel, thy

speaker: LUCIO
text: mistress? Procures she still, ha?

speaker: POMPEY
text: Troth, sir, she hath eaten up all her beef, and

speaker: POMPEY
text: she is herself in the tub.

speaker: LUCIO
text: Why, ’tis good. It is the right of it. It must be so.

speaker: LUCIO
text: Ever your fresh whore and your powdered bawd, an

speaker: LUCIO
text: unshunned consequence; it must be so. Art going to

speaker: LUCIO
text: prison, Pompey?

speaker: POMPEY
text: Yes, faith, sir.

speaker: LUCIO
text: Why, ’tis not amiss, Pompey. Farewell. Go say I

speaker: LUCIO
text: sent thee thither. For debt, Pompey? Or how?

speaker: ELBOW
text: For being a bawd, for being a bawd.

speaker: LUCIO
text: Well, then, imprison him. If imprisonment be

speaker: LUCIO
text: the due of a bawd, why, ’tis his right. Bawd is he,

speaker: LUCIO
text: doubtless, and of antiquity too. Bawd born.—

speaker: LUCIO
text: Farewell, good Pompey. Commend me to the prison,

speaker: LUCIO
text: Pompey. You will turn good husband now,

speaker: LUCIO
text: Pompey; you will keep the house.

speaker: POMPEY
text: I hope, sir, your good Worship will be my bail.

speaker: LUCIO
text: No, indeed, will I not, Pompey; it is not the

speaker: LUCIO
text: wear. I will pray, Pompey, to increase your bondage.

speaker: LUCIO
text: If you take it not patiently, why, your mettle is

speaker: LUCIO
text: the more. Adieu, trusty Pompey.—Bless you, friar.

speaker: DUKE
text: And you.

speaker: LUCIO
text: Does Bridget paint still, Pompey,

speaker: LUCIO
text: ha?

speaker: ELBOW
text: Come your ways, sir, come.

speaker: POMPEY
text: You will not bail me, then, sir?

speaker: LUCIO
text: Then, Pompey, nor now.—What news abroad,

speaker: LUCIO
text: friar? What news?

speaker: ELBOW
text: Come your ways, sir, come.

speaker: LUCIO
text: Go to kennel, Pompey, go.

speaker: LUCIO
text: What news, friar, of the Duke?

speaker: DUKE
text: I know none. Can you tell me of any?

speaker: LUCIO
text: Some say he is with the Emperor of Russia;

speaker: LUCIO
text: other some, he is in Rome. But where is he, think

speaker: LUCIO
text: you?

speaker: DUKE
text: I know not where, but wheresoever, I

speaker: DUKE
text: wish him well.

speaker: LUCIO
text: It was a mad fantastical trick of him to steal

speaker: LUCIO
text: from the state and usurp the beggary he was never

speaker: LUCIO
text: born to. Lord Angelo dukes it well in his absence.

speaker: LUCIO
text: He puts transgression to ’t.

speaker: DUKE
text: He does well in ’t.

speaker: LUCIO
text: A little more lenity to lechery would do no harm

speaker: LUCIO
text: in him. Something too crabbed that way, friar.

speaker: DUKE
text: It is too general a vice, and severity

speaker: DUKE
text: must cure it.

speaker: LUCIO
text: Yes, in good sooth, the vice is of a great kindred;

speaker: LUCIO
text: it is well allied, but it is impossible to extirp it quite,

speaker: LUCIO
text: friar, till eating and drinking be put down. They say

speaker: LUCIO
text: this Angelo was not made by man and woman after

speaker: LUCIO
text: this downright way of creation. Is it true, think

speaker: LUCIO
text: you?

speaker: DUKE
text: How should he be made, then?

speaker: LUCIO
text: Some report a sea-maid spawned him; some,

speaker: LUCIO
text: that he was begot between two stockfishes. But it is

speaker: LUCIO
text: certain that when he makes water, his urine is

speaker: LUCIO
text: congealed ice; that I know to be true. And he is a

speaker: LUCIO
text: motion generative, that’s infallible.

speaker: DUKE
text: You are pleasant, sir, and speak apace.

speaker: LUCIO
text: Why, what a ruthless thing is this in him, for the

speaker: LUCIO
text: rebellion of a codpiece to take away the life of a

speaker: LUCIO
text: man! Would the duke that is absent have done this?

speaker: LUCIO
text: Ere he would have hanged a man for the getting

speaker: LUCIO
text: a hundred bastards, he would have paid for the

speaker: LUCIO
text: nursing a thousand. He had some feeling of the

speaker: LUCIO
text: sport, he knew the service, and that instructed him

speaker: LUCIO
text: to mercy.

speaker: DUKE
text: I never heard the absent duke much

speaker: DUKE
text: detected for women. He was not inclined that way.

speaker: LUCIO
text: O, sir, you are deceived.

speaker: DUKE
text: ’Tis not possible.

speaker: LUCIO
text: Who, not the Duke? Yes, your beggar of fifty;

speaker: LUCIO
text: and his use was to put a ducat in her clack-dish. The

speaker: LUCIO
text: Duke had crotchets in him. He would be drunk too,

speaker: LUCIO
text: that let me inform you.

speaker: DUKE
text: You do him wrong, surely.

speaker: LUCIO
text: Sir, I was an inward of his. A shy fellow was the

speaker: LUCIO
text: Duke, and I believe I know the cause of his

speaker: LUCIO
text: withdrawing.

speaker: DUKE
text: What, I prithee, might be the cause?

speaker: LUCIO
text: No, pardon. ’Tis a secret must be locked within

speaker: LUCIO
text: the teeth and the lips. But this I can let you

speaker: LUCIO
text: understand: the greater file of the subject held the

speaker: LUCIO
text: Duke to be wise.

speaker: DUKE
text: Wise? Why, no question but he was.

speaker: LUCIO
text: A very superficial, ignorant, unweighing fellow.

speaker: DUKE
text: Either this is envy in you, folly, or

speaker: DUKE
text: mistaking. The very stream of his life and the

speaker: DUKE
text: business he hath helmed must, upon a warranted

speaker: DUKE
text: need, give him a better proclamation. Let him be

speaker: DUKE
text: but testimonied in his own bringings-forth, and he

speaker: DUKE
text: shall appear to the envious a scholar, a statesman,

speaker: DUKE
text: and a soldier. Therefore you speak unskillfully. Or,

speaker: DUKE
text: if your knowledge be more, it is much darkened in

speaker: DUKE
text: your malice.

speaker: LUCIO
text: Sir, I know him, and I love him.

speaker: DUKE
text: Love talks with better knowledge, and

speaker: DUKE
text: knowledge with dearer love.

speaker: LUCIO
text: Come, sir, I know what I know.

speaker: DUKE
text: I can hardly believe that, since you

speaker: DUKE
text: know not what you speak. But if ever the Duke

speaker: DUKE
text: return, as our prayers are he may, let me desire you

speaker: DUKE
text: to make your answer before him. If it be honest you

speaker: DUKE
text: have spoke, you have courage to maintain it. I am

speaker: DUKE
text: bound to call upon you, and, I pray you, your name?

speaker: LUCIO
text: Sir, my name is Lucio, well known to the Duke.

speaker: DUKE
text: He shall know you better, sir, if I may

speaker: DUKE
text: live to report you.

speaker: LUCIO
text: I fear you not.

speaker: DUKE
text: O, you hope the Duke will return no

speaker: DUKE
text: more, or you imagine me too unhurtful an opposite.

speaker: DUKE
text: But indeed I can do you little harm; you’ll

speaker: DUKE
text: forswear this again.

speaker: LUCIO
text: I’ll be hanged first. Thou art deceived in me,

speaker: LUCIO
text: friar. But no more of this. Canst thou tell if Claudio

speaker: LUCIO
text: die tomorrow or no?

speaker: DUKE
text: Why should he die, sir?

speaker: LUCIO
text: Why? For filling a bottle with a tundish. I would

speaker: LUCIO
text: the Duke we talk of were returned again. This

speaker: LUCIO
text: ungenitured agent will unpeople the province with

speaker: LUCIO
text: continency. Sparrows must not build in his house

speaker: LUCIO
text: eaves, because they are lecherous. The Duke yet

speaker: LUCIO
text: would have dark deeds darkly answered. He would

speaker: LUCIO
text: never bring them to light Would he were returned.

speaker: LUCIO
text: Marry, this Claudio is condemned for untrussing.

speaker: LUCIO
text: Farewell, good friar. I prithee pray for me. The

speaker: LUCIO
text: Duke, I say to thee again, would eat mutton on

speaker: LUCIO
text: Fridays. He’s now past it, yet—and I say to thee—

speaker: LUCIO
text: he would mouth with a beggar though she smelt

speaker: LUCIO
text: brown bread and garlic. Say that I said so. Farewell.

text: Go, away with her to prison.

speaker: BAWD
text: Good my lord, be good to me. Your Honor is

speaker: BAWD

text: swear and play the tyrant.

speaker: BAWD
text: with child by him in the Duke’s time; he promised

speaker: BAWD

speaker: BAWD
text: how he goes about to abuse me.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: That fellow is a fellow of much license. Let

speaker: ESCALUS
text: him be called before us. Away with her to prison.—

speaker: ESCALUS
text: Go to, no more words.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: Provost, my brother Angelo will not be altered.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: Claudio must die tomorrow. Let him be furnished

speaker: ESCALUS
text: with divines and have all charitable preparation. If

speaker: ESCALUS
text: my brother wrought by my pity, it should not be so

speaker: ESCALUS
text: with him.

speaker: PROVOST
text: So please you, this friar hath been with him,

speaker: PROVOST
text: and advised him for th’ entertainment of death.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: Good even, good father.

speaker: DUKE
text: Bliss and goodness on you.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: What news abroad i’ th’ world?

speaker: DUKE
text: None but that there is so great a fever

speaker: DUKE
text: on goodness that the dissolution of it must cure it.

speaker: DUKE
text: Novelty is only in request, and it is as dangerous to

speaker: DUKE
text: be aged in any kind of course as it is virtuous to be

speaker: DUKE
text: constant in any undertaking. There is scarce truth

speaker: DUKE
text: enough alive to make societies secure, but security

speaker: DUKE
text: enough to make fellowships accursed. Much upon

speaker: DUKE
text: this riddle runs the wisdom of the world. This news

speaker: DUKE
text: is old enough, yet it is every day’s news. I pray you,

speaker: DUKE
text: sir, of what disposition was the Duke?

speaker: ESCALUS
text: One that, above all other strifes, contended

speaker: ESCALUS
text: especially to know himself.

speaker: DUKE
text: What pleasure was he given to?

speaker: ESCALUS
text: Rather rejoicing to see another merry than

speaker: ESCALUS
text: merry at anything which professed to make him

speaker: ESCALUS
text: rejoice—a gentleman of all temperance. But leave

speaker: ESCALUS
text: we him to his events, with a prayer they may prove

speaker: ESCALUS
text: prosperous, and let me desire to know how you find

speaker: ESCALUS
text: Claudio prepared. I am made to understand that

speaker: ESCALUS
text: you have lent him visitation.

speaker: DUKE
text: He professes to have received no

speaker: DUKE
text: sinister measure from his judge but most willingly

speaker: DUKE
text: humbles himself to the determination of justice. Yet

speaker: DUKE
text: had he framed to himself, by the instruction of his

speaker: DUKE
text: frailty, many deceiving promises of life, which I, by

speaker: DUKE
text: my good leisure, have discredited to him, and now

speaker: DUKE
text: is he resolved to die.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: You have paid the heavens your function and

speaker: ESCALUS
text: the prisoner the very debt of your calling. I have

speaker: ESCALUS
text: labored for the poor gentleman to the extremest

speaker: ESCALUS
text: shore of my modesty, but my brother justice have I

speaker: ESCALUS
text: found so severe that he hath forced me to tell him

speaker: ESCALUS
text: he is indeed Justice.

speaker: DUKE
text: If his own life answer the straitness of

speaker: DUKE
text: his proceeding, it shall become him well; wherein if

speaker: DUKE
text: he chance to fail, he hath sentenced himself.

speaker: ESCALUS
text: I am going to visit the prisoner. Fare you well.

speaker: DUKE
text: Peace be with you.
